00085         public function process($gp,$settings) {
00086                 
00087                 //set GET/POST parameters
00088                 $this->gp = $gp;
00089                 
00090                 //set settings
00091                 $this->settings = $settings;
00092                 $this->init();
00093                 
00094                 //send emails
00095                 $this->sendMail('admin');
00096                 $this->sendMail('user');
00097                 
00098                 return $this->gp;
00099         }

00107         public function setEmailSettings($new) {
00108                 $this->emailSettings = $new;
00109         }
00110         
00118         protected function parseTemplate($mode,$suffix) {
00119                 $template = $this->getTemplate($mode,$suffix);
00120                 
00121                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($template,$this->langFile);
00122                 $valueMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledValueMarkers($this->gp);
00123                 $markers = array_merge($valueMarkers,$markers);
00124                 $this->sanitizeMarkers($markers);
00125                 $template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template, $markers);
00126                 $template = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::removeUnfilledMarkers($template);
00127                 return $template;
00128         }
00129         
00136         protected function sanitizeMarkers(&$markers) {
00137                 $checkBinaryCrLf = $this->settings['checkBinaryCrLf'];
00138                 if ($checkBinaryCrLf != '') {
00139                         $markersToCheck = t3lib_div::trimExplode(',',$checkBinaryCrLf);
00140                         foreach($markersToCheck as $idx=>$val) {
00141                                 if(substr($val,0,3) != '###') {
00142                                         $val = '###'.$markersToCheck[$idx];
00143                                 }
00144                                 
00145                                 if(substr($val,-3) != '###') {
00146                                         $val .= '###';
00147                                 }
00148                                 $iStr = $markers[$val];
00149                                 $iStr = str_replace (chr(13),'<br />', $iStr);
00150                                 $iStr = str_replace ('\\','', $iStr); 
00151                                 $markers[$val] = $iStr;
00152                                 
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155                 foreach($markers as $field=>&$value) {
00156                         $value = nl2br($value);
00157                 }
00158         }
00159         
00167         protected function getTemplate($mode,$suffix) {
00168                 $settings = $this->settings;
00169                 $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00170                 if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00171                         $templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00172                 } else {
00173                         $templateFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile);
00174                 }
00175                 $template = t3lib_div::getURL($templateFile);
00176                 $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template,"###TEMPLATE_EMAIL_".strtoupper($mode)."_".strtoupper($suffix)."###");
00177                 if(!$template) {
00178                         $template = $this->cObj->getSubpart($template,"###template_email_".strtolower($mode)."_".strtolower($suffix)."###");
00179                 }
00180                 return $template;
00181         }
00182         
00190         protected function sendMail($type) {
00191                 
00192                 $mailSettings = $this->parseMailSettings($this->settings[$type.'.'],$type);
00193                 $template['plain'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"plain");
00194                 $template['html'] = $this->parseTemplate($type,"html");
00195                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('E-Mail settings for '.$type);
00196                 //F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugArray($mailSettings);
00197                 
00198                 //init mailer object
00199                 require_once(PATH_t3lib.'class.t3lib_htmlmail.php');
00200             $emailObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_htmlmail');
00201             $emailObj->start();
00202                 
00203                 //set e-mail options
00204             $emailObj->subject = $mailSettings['subject'];
00205             
00206             $sender = $mailSettings['sender_email'];
00207             if(isset($mailSettings['sender_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['sender_email'])) {
00208                 $sender = implode(",",$mailSettings['sender_email']);
00209             }
00210             $emailObj->from_email = $sender;
00211             $emailObj->from_name = $mailSettings['sender_name'];
00212             
00213                 $replyto = $mailSettings['replyto_email'];
00214             if(isset($mailSettings['replyto_email']) && is_array($mailSettings['replyto_email'])) {
00215                 $replyto = implode(",",$mailSettings['replyto_email']);
00216             }
00217             $emailObj->replyto_email = $replyto;
00218             $emailObj->replyto_name = $mailSettings['replyto_name'];
00219             $emailObj->returnPath = '';
00220             if($mailSettings['email_header']) {
00221                 $emailObj->add_header($mailSettings['header']);
00222             }
00223             if($template['plain']) {
00224                 $emailObj->setPlain($template['plain']);
00225             }
00226                 
00227                 if($template['html']) {
00228                         if($mailSettings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) {
00229                                 $tmphtml=tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".html";
00230                                 $tmphandle=fopen($tmphtml,"wb");
00231                                 if ($tmphandle) {
00232                                         fwrite($tmphandle,$template['html']);
00233                                         fclose($tmphandle);
00234                                         $emailObj->addAttachment($tmphtml);
00235                                 }
00236                         } else {
00237                         $emailObj->setHtml($template['html']);
00238                         }
00239             }
00240                 
00241                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['attachment'])) {
00242                         $mailSettings['attachment'] = array($mailSettings['attachment']);
00243                 }
00244                 foreach($mailSettings['attachment'] as $attachment) {
00245                         if(strlen($attachment) > 0) {
00246                                 $emailObj->addAttachment($attachment);
00247                         }
00248                 }
00249                 
00250                 #print_r($settings);
00251                 if($mailSettings['attachPDF']) {
00252                         #print "adding pdf";
00253                         $emailObj->addAttachment($mailSettings['attachPDF']);
00254                 }
00255             
00256                 //parse max count of mails to send
00257             $count = 0;
00258             $max = $this->settings['limitMailsToUser'];
00259             if(!$max) {
00260                 $max = 2;
00261             }
00262                 if(!is_array($mailSettings['to_email'])) {
00263                         $settings['to_email'] = array($mailSettings['to_email']);
00264                 }
00265                 reset($mailSettings['to_email']);
00266                 
00267                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteIssetSubparts($template['html']);
00268                 $template['html'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template['html'], $markers);
00269                 $markers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::substituteIssetSubparts($template['plain']);
00270                 $template['plain'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($template['plain'], $markers);
00271                 
00272                 //send e-mails
00273             foreach($mailSettings['to_email'] as $mailto) {
00274                 
00275                 if($count < $max) {
00276                         if (strstr($mailto, '@') && !eregi("\r",$mailto) && !eregi("\n",$mailto)) {
00277                                         $sent = $emailObj->send($mailto);
00278                                 }
00279                         $count++;
00280                 }
00281                         if($sent) {
00282                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail sent to: ".$mailto);
00283                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail content:",false);
00284                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Sender: ".$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00285                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Reply to: ".$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00286                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message Plain: ".$template['plain'],false);
00287                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message HTML: ".$template['html'],false);
00288                         } else {
00289                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail sending failed to: ".$mailto);
00290                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Mail content:",false);
00291                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Sender: ".$emailObj->from_name." <".$emailObj->from_email.">",false);
00292                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Reply to: ".$emailObj->replyto_name." <".$emailObj->replyto_email.">",false);
00293                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message Plain: ".$template['plain'],false);
00294                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Message HTML: ".$template['html'],false);
00295                         }
00296             }
00297                 if($tmphtml) {
00298                         unlink($tmphtml);
00299                 }
00300         }

00309         private function explodeList($list,$sep = ",") {
00310                 $items = t3lib_div::trimExplode($sep,$list);
00311                 $splitArray = array();
00312                 foreach($items as $item) {
00313                         if(isset($this->gp[$item])) {
00314                                  array_push($splitArray,$this->gp[$item]);
00315                         } else {
00316                                 array_push($splitArray,$item);
00317                         }
00318                 }
00319                 return $splitArray;
00320         }
00321         
00328         private function parseSettingValue($value) {
00329                 if(isset($this->gp[$value])) {
00330                         $parsed = $this->gp[$value];
00331                 } else {
00332                         $parsed = $value;
00333                 }
00334                 return $parsed;
00335                 
00336         }
00337         
00347         private function parseValue($settings,$type,$key) {
00348                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00349                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00350                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00351                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00352                 } else {
00353                         $parsed = $this->parseSettingValue($settings[$key]);
00354                 }
00355                 return $parsed;
00356         }
00357         
00367         private function parseList($settings,$type,$key) {
00368                 if(isset($this->emailSettings[$type][$key])) {
00369                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($this->emailSettings[$type][$key]);
00370                 } else if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00371                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']); 
00372                 } else {
00373                         $parsed = $this->explodeList($settings[$key]);
00374                 }
00375                 return $parsed;
00376         }
00377         
00386         private function parseFilesList($settings,$type,$key) {
00387                 if(isset($settings[$key.'.']) && is_array($settings[$key.'.'])) {
00388                         $parsed = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings[$key],$settings[$key.'.']);
00389                 } elseif($settings[$key]) {
00390                         $files = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings[$key]);
00391                         $parsed = array();
00392                         session_start();
00393                         foreach($files as $file) {
00394                                 #print $file.":";
00395                                 #print_r($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']);
00396                                 if(isset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file])) {
00397                                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$file] as $uploadedFile) {
00398                                                 array_push($parsed,$uploadedFile['uploaded_path'].$uploadedFile['uploaded_name']);
00399                                         }
00400                                 } else {
00401                                         array_push($parsed,$file);
00402                                 }
00403                         }
00404                 }
00405                 return $parsed;
00406         }
00407         
00414         protected function parseMailSettings(&$settings,$type) {
00415                 if(!is_array($settings)) {
00416                         return array();
00417                 }
00418                 $options = array();
00419                 
00420                 //parse recipients
00421                 $options['to_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"to_email");
00422                 
00423                 //parse recipient name(s)
00424                 $options['to_name'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"to_name");
00425                 
00426                 //parse subject
00427                 $options['subject'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"subject");
00428                 
00429                 //parse sender
00430                 $options['sender_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"sender_email");
00431                 
00432                 //parse sender name
00433                 $options['sender_name'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"sender_name");
00434                 
00435                 //parse reply to
00436                 $options['replyto_email'] = $this->parseList($settings,$type,"replyto_email");
00437                 
00438                 //parse reply to name
00439                 $options['replyto_name'] = $this->parseValue($settings,$type,"replyto_name");
00440                 
00441                 //parse attachment
00442                 $options['attachment'] = $this->parseFilesList($settings,$type,"attachment");
00443                 #print_r($settings);
00444                 if(isset($settings['attachPDF.']) && is_array($settings['attachPDF.'])) {
00445                         #print "call";
00446                         $generatorClass = $settings['attachPDF.']['class'];
00447                         if(!$generatorClass) {
00448                                 $generatorClass = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_PDF";
00449                         }
00450                         $generator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($generatorClass);
00451                         $exportFields = array();
00452                         if($settings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']) {
00453                                 $exportFields = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$settings['attachPDF.']['exportFields']);
00454                         }
00455                         #print_r($exportFields);
00456                         $file = tempnam("typo3temp/","/mailformplusplus_").".pdf";
00457                         $generator->generateFrontendPDF($this->gp,$this->settings['langFile'],$exportFields,$file,true);
00458                         $options['attachPDF'] = $file;
00459                 } elseif ($settings['attachPDF']) {
00460                         $options['attachPDF'] = $settings['attachPDF'];
00461                 }
00462                 if(isset($settings['htmlEmailAsAttachment']) && !strcmp($settings['htmlEmailAsAttachment'],"1")) {
00463                         $options['htmlEmailAsAttachment'] = 1;
00464                 }
00465                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($options);
00466                 #print_r($options);
00467                 return $options;
00468         }
00469         
00476         protected function fillLangMarkersInSettings(&$settings) {
00477                 foreach($settings as &$value) {
00478                         if(isset($value) && is_array($value)) {
00479                                 $this->fillLangMarkersInSettings($value);
00480                         } else {
00481                                 $langMarkers = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getFilledLangMarkers($value,$this->langFile);
00482                                 if(!empty($langMarkers)) {
00483                                         $value = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($value, $langMarkers);
00484                                 }
00485                         }
00486                 }
00487         }
00488         
00494         protected function getSettings() {
00495                 return $this->configuration->getSettings();
00496         }
00497         
00503         protected function init() {
00504                 
00505                 //fetch global settings
00506                 $settings = $this->settings;
00507                 
00508                 //set language file
00509                 if(isset($settings['langFile.']) && is_array($settings['langFile.'])) {
00510                         $this->langFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['langFile'],$settings['langFile.']);
00511                 } else {
00512                         $this->langFile = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($settings['langFile']);
00513                 }
00514                 
00515                 //make cObj instance
00516                 $this->cObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tslib_cObj');
00517                 $this->cObj->setCurrentVal($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00518         }
